description:
Attorneys Edward L. Murrelle, Amber Hughes and Martza Majstoravich are the partners in our Morehead City law firm. Warren J. Davis who is retired founded the firm in 1981. The late Janet M. Lyles a partner with the firm served Eastern North Carolina for many years. Davis, Murrelle & Lyles has been serving Carteret, Craven, Onslow and other areas of Eastern North Carolina for 40 years in a wide variety of legal needs, including:

  • Automobile Accident Injuries
  • Personal Injury and Wrongful Death
  • Social Security Disability
  • Wills & Estates
  • Medical Malpractice

In addition to the above areas, we also offer representation to clients who are in the midst of a variety of civil disputes, including:

  • Business Litigation
  • Premises Liability
  • Products Liability
  • Construction Litigation
  • Real Property Disputes
  • Condominium and Homeowners Association matters
  • Workersâ€™ Compensation

Whether your legal need is personal or professional in nature, you can put your trust in the experienced legal team at Davis, Murrelle & Lyles, P.A. If you would like to discuss your specific need with a member of our team, you can do so by taking advantage of a free initial consultation at our office in Morehead.
